ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local locations = {
    ['Diamond'] = { position = { -8.00, 1.52, 12.00 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Tilde'] = { position = { -1.00, 1.52, 22.50 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Triangle'] = { position = { -1.00, 1.52, 1.50 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Square'] = { position = { 13.00, 1.52, 1.50 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Crescent'] = { position = { 13.02, 1.52, 22.49 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Circle'] = { position = { 20.01, 1.52, 12.01 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },

}

local morgan = 'e8cde0'
local rice = 'a9ecc5'
local armitage = '5a1dd5'

local oBanion = false
local naomisBand = '27a3e1'
local handyMen = { GUID = { 'a4f0dc', 'ec5438' } }


local cardUnderLocation = { '29f34e', 'e59274' }
local outOfPlayPile = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['sacrifices'] = {
        position = { 35.00, 3.61, 3.00 }
    }
}

function onLoad()
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    createButton()
    self.shuffle()
    self.randomize()
end

function createButton()
    self.createButton({
        label = "Mise en place",
        click_function = "question1",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 350,
        width = 1800,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = "Mise en place"
    })
end

function question1()
    broadcastToAll("Waren Rice a-t-il été enlevé ?", 'Yellow')
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.createButton({
        label = "Oui",
        click_function = "yes1",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 1, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 400,
        width = 800,
        font_size = 300,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = "Oui, ou bien on l'a oublié dans un placard"
    })
    self.createButton({
        label = "Non",
        click_function = "question2",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { -1, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 400,
        width = 800,
        font_size = 300,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = "Non"
    })
end

function yes1()
    sacrifice(rice)
    question2()
end

function question2()
    broadcastToAll("Francis Morgan a-t-il été enlevé ?", 'Yellow')
    local params = {}
    params.index = 0
    params.click_function = "yes2"
    params.tooltip = "Oui, ou bien on avait vraiment pris trop de verres"
    self.editButton(params)
    params.index = 1
    params.click_function = "question3"
    params.tooltip = "Non"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function yes2()
    sacrifice(morgan)
    question3()
end

function question3()
    broadcastToAll("Henry Armitage a-t-il été enlevé ?", 'Yellow')
    local params = {}
    params.index = 0
    params.click_function = "yes3"
    params.tooltip = "Oui, ou bien il est parti aux canaris"
    self.editButton(params)
    params.index = 1
    params.click_function = "question4"
    params.tooltip = "Non"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function yes3()
    sacrifice(armitage)
    question4()
end

function sacrifice(ally)
    local position = outOfPlayPile['sacrifices'].position
    local pickUpCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = ally,
        rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 180.00 }
    })
    pickUpCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
end

function question4()
    broadcastToAll("Le Gang O'Banion a-il-un compte à régler avec vous ?", 'Yellow')
    local params = {}
    params.index = 0
    params.click_function = "yes4"
    params.tooltip = "Oui, le Gang a un compte à régler"
    self.editButton(params)
    params.index = 1
    params.click_function = "question5"
    params.tooltip = "Non, on prend des bières ensemble tous les samedi"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function yes4()
    oBanion = true
    question5()
end

function question5()
    broadcastToAll("Les investigateurs ont-ils été retardés ?", 'Yellow')
    local params = {}
    params.index = 0
    params.click_function = "yes5"
    params.tooltip = "Oui, la SNCF vous prie de nous excuser pour ce retard"
    self.editButton(params)
    params.index = 1
    params.click_function = "place"
    params.tooltip = "Non, pas de retard"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function yes5()
    local agenda = getObjectFromGUID('aa7070')
    agenda.call("add_subtract")
    place()
end

function place()
    local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
    encounterDeck.shuffle()
    local iconList = {}
    for icon, card in pairs(locations) do
        table.insert(iconList, icon)
    end
    local chosenIcon = chooseAmongstInAtable(iconList, 5)
    for _, icon in ipairs(chosenIcon) do
        chooseOneAmongst(icon)
        local card = locations[icon]
        local place = self.takeObject({
            guid = card.GUID,
            rotation = card.rotation
        })
        place.setPositionSmooth(card.position, false, false)
    end
    for i = 1, 3 do
        local encounterCard = encounterDeck.takeObject()
        table.insert(cardUnderLocation, encounterCard.getGUID())
        self.putObject(encounterCard)
    end
    if oBanion then
        local place = self.takeObject({
            guid = naomisBand,
            rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 180.00 }
        })
        place.setPositionSmooth(outOfPlayPile['encounterDeck'].position, false, false)
        local position = { 6.00, 1.92, -8.47 }
        local rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0 }
        for i, guid in ipairs(handyMen.GUID) do
            local pickUpCard = self.takeObject({
                guid = guid,
                rotation = rotation
            })
            pickUpCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
            rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 180.00 }
            position = outOfPlayPile['encounterDeck'].position
        end
    end

    Wait.time(function()
        cardUnderLocation = chooseAmongstInAtable(cardUnderLocation, 5)
        for i, icon in ipairs(chosenIcon) do
            local position = locations[icon].position
            position[3] = position[3] - 3.5
            local place = self.takeObject({
                guid = cardUnderLocation[i],
                rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 180.00 }
            })
            place.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
        end
        Wait.time(function()
            broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
            self.removeButton(0)
            self.removeButton(1)
            encounterDeck.shuffle()
            if oBanion then
                Wait.time(function()
                    local handyMan = getObjectFromGUID(handyMen.GUID[1])
                    for i = 1, 5 do
                        Wait.time(function()
                            handyMan.highlightOn("White", 0.5)
                        end, i)
                    end
                    broadcastToAll("Générez l'homme de main dans un lieu non-connexe aux terrains communaux", "White")
                end, 1)
            end
        end, 2)
    end, 1)
end

function chooseOneAmongst(icon)
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    local tab = {}
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    if metadata.locationFront.icons == icon then
                        table.insert(tab, obj.GUID)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
    local n = #tab
    local i = math.random(1, n)
    locations[icon].GUID = tab[i]
end

function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        local k = math.random(1, #row + 1)
        table.insert(row, k, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function hasValue(tab, val)
    for i, v in ipairs(tab) do
        if v == val then return i end
    end
    return false
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 3, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.Nickname: VI : Là où le Destin Attend
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

local CHAOS_PANEL1_GUID = '79ad10'
local CHAOS_PANEL2_GUID = '820b51'
local chaosPanel = getObjectFromGUID(CHAOS_PANEL1_GUID) or getObjectFromGUID(CHAOS_PANEL2_GUID)
local returnCard = getObjectFromGUID('fe4064')

local outOfPlayPile = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['divergentPile'] = {
        position = { -19.50, 3.81, 3.00 } },
    ['alteredPile'] = {
        position = { -22.50, 3.81, 3.00 } },
    ['actDeck'] = {

function yes5()
    for k, obj in pairs(abomination) do
        local pickUpedCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = obj.GUID,
            rotation = obj.rotation
        })
        local position = obj.position
        pickUpedCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
    end
    place()
end

function place()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    local divergentTable = {}
    local alteredTable = {}
    for i, obj in ipairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Nickname == "Chemin Divergent"
        then
            table.insert(divergentTable, obj.GUID)
        elseif obj.Nickname == "Chemin Altéré" then
            table.insert(alteredTable, obj.GUID)
        end
    end
    local chosenDivergent = chooseAmongstInAtable(divergentTable, 3)
    local chosenAltered = chooseAmongstInAtable(alteredTable, 3)
    local rotation = { x = 0.00, y = 180.00, z = 0.00 }
    for i, guid in ipairs(chosenDivergent) do
        local pickUpedCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = guid,
            rotation = rotation
        })
        local position = outOfPlayPile['divergentPile'].position
        pickUpedCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
    end
    for i, guid in ipairs(chosenAltered) do
        local pickUpedCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = guid,
            rotation = rotation
        })
        local position = outOfPlayPile['alteredPile'].position
        pickUpedCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
    end
    rotation.y = 90
    for i, guid in ipairs(actDeck) do
        local pickUpedCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = guid,
            rotation = rotation
        })
        local position = outOfPlayPile['actDeck'].position
        position[2] = position[2] + i / 20
        pickUpedCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        local alteredPile = getOutOfPlayPile('alteredPile')
        alteredPile.shuffle()
        alteredPile.setName('Lieux Altérés')
        local divergentPile = getOutOfPlayPile('divergentPile')
        divergentPile.shuffle()
        divergentPile.setName('Lieux Divergents')
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
        Wait.time(function()
            broadcastToAll("N'oubliez-pas la règle supplémentaire du Renouveau", "White")
            for i = 0, 5 do
                Wait.time(function() returnCard.highlightOn("White", 0.5) end, i)
            end
        end, 2)
    end, 2)

    for i = 0, 1 do
        self.removeButton(i)
    end
end

---comment
---@param icon any string matching with an icon name
---@param number any number of card that must be chosen
function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        table.insert(row, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 3, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local CARD_SPAWNER_GUID  = '4412c0'
local cardSpawner        = getObjectFromGUID(CARD_SPAWNER_GUID)
local ALL_CARDS_BAG_GUID = "d3e77d"
local allCardsBag        = getObjectFromGUID(ALL_CARDS_BAG_GUID)
local CONFIG_PANEL_GUID  = 'd35363'
local configPanel        = getObjectFromGUID(CONFIG_PANEL_GUID)
local locations          = {
    ['Diamond'] = { position = { 4.00, 1.52, 12.5 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Hourglass'] = { position = { 15.00, 1.52, 23.5 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Triangle'] = { position = { 4.00, 1.52, 1.50 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Square'] = { position = { 4.00, 1.52, 23.5 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Plus'] = { position = { 15.00, 1.52, 12.5 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },
    ['Circle'] = { position = { -7.00, 1.52, 12.50 }, rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } },

}
local weaknessTraits     = { 'Injury', 'Pact', 'Madness' }
local save               = true

local buttonTable        = { {
    { label = "Mise en place", click_function = "question1", function_owner = self, position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 }, rotation = { 0, 0, 0 }, height = 350, width = 1800, font_size = 250, color = { 0, 0, 0 }, font_color = { 1, 1, 1 }, tooltip = "Mise en place" }
},
    {
        { label = "0-1", click_function = "oneSacrifice",    function_owner = self, position = { -1, 0.3, 1.8 }, rotation = { 0, 0, 0 }, height = 400, width = 800, font_size = 300, color = { 0, 0, 0 }, font_color = { 1, 1, 1 }, tooltip = "0-1" },
        { label = "2",   click_function = "twoSacrifices",   function_owner = self, position = { 1, 0.3, 1.8 },  rotation = { 0, 0, 0 }, height = 400, width = 800, font_size = 300, color = { 0, 0, 0 }, font_color = { 1, 1, 1 }, tooltip = "2" },
        { label = "3",   click_function = "threeSacrifices", function_owner = self, position = { -1, 0.3, 2.8 }, rotation = { 0, 0, 0 }, height = 400, width = 800, font_size = 300, color = { 0, 0, 0 }, font_color = { 1, 1, 1 }, tooltip = "3" },
        { label = "4 +", click_function = "fourSacrifices",  function_owner = self, position = { 1, 0.3, 2.8 },  rotation = { 0, 0, 0 }, height = 400, width = 800, font_size = 300, color = { 0, 0, 0 }, font_color = { 1, 1, 1 }, tooltip = "4 ou plus" }
    },
    {
        { label = "Lieu au Hasard", click_function = "randomLocation", function_owner = self, position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 }, rotation = { 0, 0, 0 }, scale = { 1.2, 1.2, 1.2 }, height = 350, width = 1800, font_size = 250, color = { 0, 0, 0 }, font_color = { 1, 1, 1 }, tooltip = "Cliquez pour choisir un lieu au Hasard" }
    }, }
local buttonIndex

local yogSotothBrood     = {}
local outOfPlayPile      = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['outOfPlayBroods'] = {
        position = { -28.00, 3.82, 3.50 }
    }
}

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if save then
        if saved_data ~= "" then
            local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
            buttonIndex = loaded_data[1] - 1
            if buttonIndex ~= 0 then
                rebuildLocationTable()
            end
        end
    else
        buttonIndex = 0
    end
    self.shuffle()
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    updateButtons()
    -- buildYogSothothBroodTable()
end

function onSave()
    if save then
        self.script_state = JSON.encode({ buttonIndex })
    else
        self.script_state = JSON.encode({ 1 })
    end
end

function updateButtons()
    buttonIndex = buttonIndex + 1
    self.clearButtons()
    for i, tab in ipairs(buttonTable[buttonIndex]) do
        self.createButton(tab)
    end
end

function question1()
    broadcastToAll("Combien de sacrifiés à Yog Sothoth ?", 'Yellow')
    updateButtons()
end

function oneSacrifice()
    spawnBroods(3, 2)
    setUp()
end

function twoSacrifices()
    spawnBroods(3, 1)
    setUp()
end

function threeSacrifices()
    spawnBroods(2, 1)
    setUp()
end

function fourSacrifices()
    spawnBroods(2, 0)
    setUp()
end

function spawnBroods(OutofPlay, inGame)
    local outOfPlayBroods = getOutOfPlayPile('outOfPlayBroods')
    outOfPlayBroods.shuffle()
    outOfPlayBroods.setName('Rejetons de Yog Sothoth')
    local RemoveFromTheGame = 5 - OutofPlay - inGame
    Wait.time(function()
        if RemoveFromTheGame ~= 0 then
            for i = 1, RemoveFromTheGame do
                local pickedUpCard = outOfPlayBroods.takeObject()
                self.putObject(pickedUpCard)
            end
        end
        if inGame ~= 0 then
            local destinations = { 'Triangle', 'Square' }
            for i = 1, inGame do
                local icon = destinations[i]
                local pickedUpCard = outOfPlayBroods.takeObject({
                    rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0 },
                    position = Vector(locations[icon].position) + Vector(2.5, 0, 0),
                    smooth = true
                })
            end
        end
    end, 1)
end

function setUp()
    for icon, card in pairs(locations) do
        chooseOneAmongst(icon)
        local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = card.GUID,
            rotation = card.rotation
        })
        pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(card.position, false, false)
    end
    local numberOfInvestigators = configPanel.call("getInvCount")
    spawnRandomTraitWeakness(weaknessTraits, numberOfInvestigators)
    self.clearButtons()
    self.setName("Lieux au hasard")
    updateButtons()
    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 3)
end

function chooseOneAmongst(icon)
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    local tab = {}
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    if metadata.locationFront.icons == icon then
                        locations[icon].GUID = obj.GUID
                        return
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        local k = math.random(1, #row + 1)
        table.insert(row, k, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 3, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

function spawnRandomTraitWeakness(tableTraits, number)
    local chosenWeaknesses = {}
    local cardList = {}
    local availableWeaknesses = allCardsBag.call("buildAvailableWeaknesses")
    for i, id in ipairs(availableWeaknesses) do
        local card = allCardsBag.call("getCardById", { id = id })
        local metadata = card.metadata
        for _, trait in ipairs(tableTraits) do
            if string.find(metadata.traits, trait) ~= nil then
                local j = math.random(1, #chosenWeaknesses + 1)
                table.insert(chosenWeaknesses, j, card)
            end
        end
    end
    chosenWeaknesses = chooseAmongstInAtable(chosenWeaknesses, #chosenWeaknesses)
    for i = 1, number do
        if chosenWeaknesses == {} then
            broadcastToAll("Pas asssez de cartes éligibles", { 0.9, 0.2, 0.2 })
        else
            local j = math.random(#chosenWeaknesses)
            table.insert(cardList, chosenWeaknesses[j])
            table.remove(chosenWeaknesses, j)
        end
    end

    Wait.frames(function()
        local spreadValue = #cardList
        local startpos_x
        if spreadValue % 2 ~= 0 then
            local n = (spreadValue - 1) / 2
            startpos_x = -(2.33 * n + 1.165)
        else
            local n = spreadValue / 2
            startpos_x = -2.33 * n
        end
        cardSpawner.call('spawnCardSpread',
            {
                cardList = cardList,
                startPos = { x = 6.00 + startpos_x, y = 4.49, z = -11.50 },
                maxCols = spreadValue + 1,
                rot = { x = 0.00, y = 180.00, z = 0.00 },
                sort = false,
                callbackParams = nil
            })
        broadcastToAll('Faiblesses de base générées', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 1)
end

function randomLocation()
    self.randomize()
    self.shuffle()
    local chosenIcon = chooseLocationIcon()
    local chosenLocation = getObjectFromGUID(locations[chosenIcon].GUID)
    chosenLocation.highlightOn({ 1, 0, 0.25 }, 1)

    broadcastToAll('Déplacez le Rejeton de Yog Sothoth vers le lieu « ' .. chosenLocation.getName() .. ' »',
        { 1, 0, 0.25 })
end

function chooseLocationIcon()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    local tab = {}
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    return metadata.locationFront.icons
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function rebuildLocationTable()
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = { 4.63, 1.79, 13.15 },
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 35, 5.10, 35 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })
    for _, hit in ipairs(hitList) do
        local object = hit.hit_object
        if object.type == "Card" then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', object.getData())
            if metadata then
                if metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    local icon = metadata.locationFront.icons
                    locations[icon].GUID = object.getGUID()
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

            tooltip = "Chaos bag du mode "..button.label,
            color = {0.5647, 0.4627, 0.2353, 1},
